channel.title: [PI]Enhancing Server[PI]
channel.description:
Hey I was wondering if there was any way to enhance my server. I have around 15 players online, and my server just lags everyone out and then I have to reset it. I need to sleep sometime, so I need to enhance my server's engine or something. Please help.
Base: Project Insanity Source: Torva Pkz

item.title: [PI]Enhancing Server[PI]
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:10, topic:408320”][quote author=ExtremeX-Scape™ link=topic=509603.msg3698259#msg3698259 date=1312583719]

It’s obviously dspk’s deadlock.

A. Use Hyperion,

The fact you suggested that was stupid. Nobody is going to hop from fucking dspk to Hyperion, and Hyperion isn’t the fucking answer to all problems.

I have made one kid hop from pi to Hyperion.
[/quote]

1/100

u gud nao[/quote]

he only supports dspk leeches.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Enhancing Server[PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

I’m not hosting it on my computer. It’s on a VPS. It’s not the VPS’s fault though, I submitted a ticket and they came back with a message saying I had very low ping, forgot the number. They also said it was very stable.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: [PI]Enhancing Server[PI]
item.dc:creator: @iCharizard iCharizard
item.description:
@iCharizard wrote:

From what I heard PI isn’t stable at all. But there are fixes for Memory leaks if you havn’t fixed them, I guess you could just search. But I recommend not using PI as they are unstable.

Read full topic
